note.p: Sister-in-law of Charles Waterton. Born in Demarara (now Guyana), daughter of Charles Edmonstone and his wife, Helen Reid, later of Cardross Park, Dumbarton, Scotland. Helen Reid was the daughter of William Reid, a Scot, and Minda, the daughter of an Arawak chief. Eliza was educated at a convent in Bruges, Belgium. Her sister Anne Mary (or Ann) (1810–30) married Charles Waterton in Bruges in May 1829 and December 1829 in Yorkshire. Lived with her brother-in-law at Walton Hall, Sandal Magna, Yorkshire, 1851, 1861; later lived in Bruges and died in Belgium.
